paper_abstract: A two parallel machines scheduling problem where one machine is periodically unavailable with the objective of minimizing makespan is considered. It is showed that the worst-case ratio of the classical LPT algorithm and the competitive ratio of the LS algorithm are 3/2 and 2, respectively, for the offline version and the online version of the problem. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Makespan minimization for two parallel machines scheduling with a periodic availability constraint
